mapper.select: select gcode from guardian where memid=#{memid}
select ccode,gcode,cname,cgen,caddress,cidnum,cage from children where gcode=#{gcode}

select * from kindergarten
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} and kinkindcode=#{kinkindcode}
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} and kinkindcode=#{kinkindcode} and kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%')
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} and kinname like CONCAT('%',#{kinname},'%')
where sigungucode=#{sigungucode} order by kinkindcode
select kinname,kinaddress from kindergarten where kincode=#{kincode}
select cname from children where ccode=#{ccode}
select count(*) from enroll where ccode=#{ccode} and (statcode != 5 or statcode != 6)
select count(*) from enroll where ccode=#{ccode} and kincode=#{kincode} and (statcode != 5 or statcode != 6)
select encode,statcode,date_add(enlog,interval +7 day) enlog from enroll where ccode=#{ccode} and kincode=#{kincode}

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,k.kincode,e.hopedate,c.crank,s.status,date_add(e.enlog,interval +7 day) enlog from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and (e.statcode<5 or e.statcode=8) order by e.encode

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,e.hopedate,s.status from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and (e.statcode=5 or e.statcode=6) order by e.encode

SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, encode,cname,crank,enlog FROM (SELECT e.encode,c.cname,c.crank,e.enlog FROM enroll e,children c,kindergarten k where e.ccode=c.ccode and e.kincode=k.kincode and (e.statcode<5 or e.statcode=8) and k.kincode=#{kincode} order by crank desc,enlog ) t, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R

select e.encode,c.cname,k.kinname,e.hopedate,e.enlog,s.status from guardian g,children c,enroll e,kindergarten k,status_code s where c.ccode=e.ccode and k.kincode=e.kincode and s.statcode=e.statcode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and e.statcode=7
select enfile,enorigin from enroll where encode=#{encode}
select refile,reorigin from regular_enroll where re_encode=#{re_encode}

SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, encode,cname,hopedate,crank,en,status,ccode,enfile FROM (SELECT e.encode,c.cname,e.hopedate,c.crank,date_add(e.enlog,interval +7 day) en,s.status,c.ccode,e.enfile FROM enroll e,children c,status_code s,kindergarten k where e.ccode=c.ccode and e.statcode=s.statcode and k.kincode=e.kincode and k.kincode=#{kincode} and (s.statcode<5 or s.statcode=8) order by c.crank desc,e.enlog ) t, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R
mapper.update: update enroll set statcode=#{statcode} where encode=#{encode}
update enroll set statcode=5 where encode=#{encode}
mapper.select: select * from regular_recruit where kincode=#{kincode} order by recode
select r.recode,k.kinname,s.sigungu,r.renum,r.reopen,r.redetail,r.redate,k.kincode from regular_recruit r,kindergarten k,sigungu s where r.kincode=k.kincode and s.sigungucode=r.sigungucode
select * from regular_recruit where recode=#{recode}
select * from kindergarten where kincode=#{kincode}

select re.re_encode,c.cname,k.kinname,k.kincode,re.rehopedate,res.restate,date_add(re.re_log,interval +7 day) enlog from guardian g,children c,kindergarten k,regular_code res,regular_enroll re,regular_recruit rre where c.ccode=re.ccode and k.kincode=rre.kincode and rre.recode=re.recode and re.re_statecode=res.re_statecode and g.gcode=c.gcode and g.gcode=#{gcode} and re.re_statecode<=2 order by re.re_encode

select re.re_encode,c.cname,k.kinname,re.rehopedate,re.re_log,res.restate from guardian g,children c,regular_enroll re,kindergarten k,regular_code res,regular_recruit rre where c.ccode=re.ccode and k.kincode=rre.kincode and rre.recode=re.recode and re.re_statecode=res.re_statecode and g.gcode=c.gcode and re.re_statecode=3 and g.gcode=#{gcode} order by re.re_encode
mapper.update: update regular_enroll set re_statecode=4 where re_encode=#{re_encode}
mapper.select: select re.re_encode,c.cname,k.kinname,re.rehopedate,res.restate from guardian g,children c,regular_enroll re,kindergarten k,regular_code res,regular_recruit rre where c.ccode=re.ccode and k.kincode=rre.kincode and rre.recode=re.recode and re.re_statecode=res.re_statecode and g.gcode=c.gcode and (re.re_statecode=4 or re.re_statecode=5) and g.gcode=#{gcode} order by re.re_encode

select re.re_encode,c.cname,k.kincode,re.rehopedate,res.restate,date_add(re.re_log,interval +7 day) enlog,rre.recode,rre.redate,c.ccode,re.refile from guardian g,children c,kindergarten k,regular_code res,regular_enroll re,regular_recruit rre where c.ccode=re.ccode and k.kincode=rre.kincode and rre.recode=re.recode and re.re_statecode=res.re_statecode and g.gcode=c.gcode and k.kincode=#{kincode} and re.re_statecode<=2 order by rre.recode

select re.re_encode,c.cname,re.rehopedate,res.restate from guardian g,children c,regular_enroll re,kindergarten k,regular_code res,regular_recruit rre where c.ccode=re.ccode and k.kincode=rre.kincode and rre.recode=re.recode and re.re_statecode=res.re_statecode and g.gcode=c.gcode and re.re_statecode=3 and k.kincode=#{kincode} order by re.re_encode
mapper.update: update regular_enroll set re_statecode=5 where re_encode=#{re_encode}
mapper.select: select re.re_encode,c.cname,re.rehopedate,res.restate from guardian g,children c,regular_enroll re,kindergarten k,regular_code res,regular_recruit rre where c.ccode=re.ccode and k.kincode=rre.kincode and rre.recode=re.recode and re.re_statecode=res.re_statecode and g.gcode=c.gcode and (re.re_statecode=4 or re.re_statecode=5) and k.kincode=#{kincode} order by re.re_encode
select * from children where ccode=#{ccode}

select k.kinname,k.kinaddress,k.kinphone,k.kinroom,k.kinarea,k.kinplay,k.kinteacher,k.kinmax,k.kincurrent,ki.kinkind,k.kinhome from kindergarten k, kinkind ki where k.kinkindcode=ki.kinkindcode and k.kincode=#{kincode}
select count(*) from class where kincode=#{kincode}

select ch.clcode,cl.clname,ch.cname,ch.cgen,m.memphone,ch.ccode,ch.cage from children ch,member m,guardian g,class cl,kindergarten k where cl.clcode=ch.clcode and m.memid=g.memid and g.gcode=ch.gcode and k.kincode=cl.kincode and ch.clcode=#{clcode}
